name: Smashing Dice
description:
Oh no... Evil dice are attacking. You need to protect ypur place by rolling yourself (alse a dice, but a good one).   
How to play this game: Point and click where you want to roll your dice. It will kill all enemy dice on it's way.  Number on your dice is added to your points, but only if you killed an enemy. This shows how many dice for you to roll there are left. And if you have more than 25 (or 25) points, ypu can use the MEGABOMB and kill all evil dice at once.  If red dice toches your cirlce - game over.
